Package ohos.media.audio

Class SoundEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.SoundEffect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioEqualizer, EchoCancelerEffect, GainControlEffect, NoiseSuppressorEffect

    public class SoundEffect
extends Object
    Manages sound effects.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundEffect

        public SoundEffect​(UUID uid,
                   UUID type,
                   int priority,
                   int sessionId,
                   String packageName)
            throws UnsupportedOperationException
        A constructor used to create a SoundEffect instance.
        Parameters:
        uid - Indicates a sound effect ID.
        type - Indicates a sound effect type.
        priority - Indicates the priority of a sound effect.
        sessionId - Indicates the ID of an audio recording or playback session.
        packageName - Indicates an application package name.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Throws this exception if initialization of this class fails.
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • isEffectAvailable

        public static boolean isEffectAvailable​(UUID type)
        Checks whether a device supports sound effects of a specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates a sound effect type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the device supports sound effects of the specified type; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • acquireEffects

        public static SoundEffect.SoundEffectInfo[] acquireEffects​()
        Obtains sound effects available on a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of available sound effects.
        Since:
        1

      • getEffectInfo

        public SoundEffect.SoundEffectInfo getEffectInfo​()
        Obtains sound effect information.
        Returns:
        Returns a SoundEffectInfo object containing the sound effect information.
        Since:
        1

      • getEffectId

        public int getEffectId​()
        Obtains the native ID of a sound effect.
        Returns:
        Returns the native ID of the audio effect.
        Since:
        1

      • setActivated

        public boolean setActivated​(boolean activated)
        Sets the sound effect status.
        Parameters:
        activated - Specifies whether to activate a sound effect. Value true means the sound effect will be activated, while false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the sound effect is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getActivated

        public boolean getActivated​()
        Checks whether a sound effect is activated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the sound effect is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • release

        public boolean release​()
        Releases sound effect resources.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the resources are released; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1
